/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street below is a hive of activity, filled with cars and buses navigating their way through the city's arteries. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the sides of the street, their facades a testament to the architectural diversity of the city. Amidst the concrete jungle, pockets of greenery provide a refreshing contrast, hinting at the presence of parks or public spaces nearby. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, casting a bright light that illuminates the scene below.
